Developer Guide

Point of Sale

SimplePOS is developed using Laravel & Vuejs. It's suitable for small and medium businesses with simple and friendly user interface.

Online Booking

Allow your clients to book appointments directly on your website with option to require a partial/full payment upfront.

Extensive Reports

Along standard reports, we also provide you with a number of advanced reports that give you deeper insight into your business.
